metadata.synopsis: Default dialogue for Hydrangea, one of the hag support group players can meet in the Lower city. The hag support group is made up of people who have survived an encouter with a hag, and who have banded together to try to research hags, but also to be there for one another. However, one of their group (the dragonborn), is secretly a redcap and is toying with their minds. The redcap has also, if Mayrina is present, hexed her and turned her into a sheep. If Mayrina isn't present, the redcap has enchanted a doll that is terrifying the group.This dialogue covers a number of states such as 1) Mayrina is present and has been hexed 2) player cured her 3) player has saved Hydrangea and the others from a redcap 4) the hag is dead and Hydrangea rewards them (if no other npc is present) 5) if mayrina isn't present, a doll is terrorising them and she's trying to find it
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I"- Cllick on Hydrangea Wubb at the Hag Survivors Support Group, -52; 11; -157

9.speaker: Mask of Regret
9.text: Oi! Mayrina's been looking for you. Best speak to her sharpish.

11.speaker: Mask of Regret
11.text: I can't believe one of our own was a redcap! Why didn't I see it?!

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Don't blame yourself - his disguise was excellent.

44.speaker: Mask of Regret
44.text: I've seen it before - had a hag mask root itself to my face! I should've known.

73.speaker: Mask of Regret
73.text: And the worst part is, this isn't gonna stop. The hag knows about that damn book. What am I going to do?
73.context: NodeContext: a little panicked, but trying to keep her cool

21.speaker: Player
21.context: NodeContext: annoyed at herself, speaking a little fast

7.speaker: Mask of Regret
7.text: I'll be honest, I don't bloody understand it. I just know the cleric was excited about it, said it was a hag's 'deepest secret'.
7.context: NodeContext: annoyed at herself, speaking a little fast

15.speaker: Mask of Regret
15.text: It's in a safe in the back - take the damn thing, preferably far away. I didn't sign up for this.
15.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Look, all I care about is killing Ethel.
76.context: NodeContext: speaking a little fast, frantic - this could be the key

26.speaker: Mask of Regret
26.text: Wait - the cleric said this was a hag's 'deepest secret'! Something about the 'cold permanence of death' or some shit.
26.context: NodeContext: speaking a little fast, frantic - this could be the key

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Let's find this hag then - where is she?
35.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it

47.speaker: Mask of Regret
47.text: Not a godsdamned clue - she could be anywhere. Any one of us.
47.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it

37.speaker: Mask of Regret
37.text: There's a safe in the back - cleric hid the book there. Said it was a hag's 'deepest secret' or something.
37.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it

64.speaker: Mask of Regret
64.text: But I didn't sign up for this - take the damn thing, preferably far away from here.
64.context: NodeContext: scared but trying to hide it

59.speaker: Player
59.text: I'm not getting mixed up in this.

70.speaker: Mask of Regret
70.text: You think I want to be?

41.speaker: Player
41.text: He mentioned a book. What was he talking about?
41.context: NodeContext: a little panicked, but trying to keep her cool

2.speaker: Mask of Regret
2.text: Gods, the book - how could I have forgotten about the book.
2.context: NodeContext: a little panicked, but trying to keep her cool

24.speaker: Mask of Regret
24.text: As long as I have it the hag will never stop hunting me. What am I going to do?
24.context: NodeContext: a little panicked, but trying to keep her cool

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Why was he even here? Why go to the trouble?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: You should have known better - this isn't your first hag.

16.speaker: Mask of Regret
16.text: My head is splitting - damn hag magic. What was that redcap even doing here? Oh, gods.
16.context: NodeContext: speaking to herself, head is in pain, trying to calm down (just after combat)

13.speaker: Mask of Regret
13.text: Mayrina! The redcap might have hurt her - she's just upstairs. Hurry!
13.context: NodeContext: Freaking out, full on anxiety spiral after a fight with a red cap - pulling out long enough to direct the player and the burrying face in hands and freaking out again

25.speaker: Mask of Regret
25.text: Not here, or here - where is this bloody doll?

28.speaker: Mask of Regret
28.text: You should have 'hag-slayer supreme' tattooed on you. I might know a guy...

20.speaker: Player
20.text: His disguise was excellent - you couldn't have known.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Hags, and their minions, do evil things.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: You need to do a better job protecting Mayrina.

32.speaker: Mask of Regret
32.text: Or maybe I'm not cut out for this.

0.speaker: Mask of Regret
0.text: Sorry - don't mind my pity party.

30.speaker: Mask of Regret
30.text: Thank you - for stepping up when I didn't. I'm damn glad you were here.
30.context: NodeContext: grateful and also disappointed in herself

34.speaker: Mask of Regret
34.text: You'll make the hag rue the day she set foot in this city - I know it. Go get her.

42.speaker: Mask of Regret
42.text: Any luck turning our girl Mayrina back to her fine human-self?

45.speaker: Mask of Regret
45.text: The hells is Jatlo roaring about?

46.speaker: Mask of Regret
46.text: I'll keep an eye out for any more hag tricks, don't you worry.

17.speaker: Mask of Regret
17.text: Our girl Mayrina is in a bind - and I'm praying you can figure out this hex.
17.context: NodeContext: familiar, player is a comrad in arms

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Have you seen a doll around here?
19.context: NodeContext: unsure, but not dismissive -knows if the player brought it up it was for good reason

27.speaker: Mask of Regret
27.text: Thought I spotted something doll-like in the back, but it was only for a moment. Can't say for sure.
27.context: NodeContext: unsure, but not dismissive -knows if the player brought it up it was for good reason

63.speaker: Player
63.text: A sheep is fine. Mayrina's suffered worse.

72.speaker: Mask of Regret
72.text: True, but there's a reason it's a straw that breaks the worg's back. She needs help - and fast.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: I'm surprised to see you tangled up with a hag again.

48.speaker: Mask of Regret
48.text: Well, it was stick around or curl up into a ball and cry - which is still on the cards.

22.speaker: Mask of Regret
22.text: Mayrina better come out of this in one piece. Hag magic leaves scars - ones that aren't so easily healed.
22.context: NodeContext: thinking of her own run in with ethel (ethel forced her to wear a mask of roots and serve her)

75.speaker: Player
75.text: You should leave while you still can.

43.speaker: Mask of Regret
43.text: I don't leave friends in witch's claws.

55.speaker: Mask of Regret
55.text: Haven't seen you since you saved my hide from Eth - from the hag. But we've no time for a drink and natter.
55.context: NodeContext: can't say 'ethel' too traumatised since the hag. Regardless, determined, no nonsense

77.speaker: Mask of Regret
77.text: We need to find the doll - now, before its hag magic gets its teeth in us.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: How do you know this is the work of a hag?

38.speaker: Mask of Regret
38.text: It's a creepy doll that pops up to scare the skin off of us - of course it's a hag. Who else would be that deranged?

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Where have you seen the doll?

4.speaker: Mask of Regret
4.text: Upstairs, downstairs - all over the place.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: If this is the work of a hag, I'm surprised you're still here.

71.speaker: Mask of Regret
71.text: But a certain someone showed me that hags aren't invincible. So let's find this damn doll, and prove that we won't be so easily beaten.

57.speaker: Mask of Regret
57.text: I've had a splitting headache since I woke up in the hag's lair.
57.context: NodeContext: voice peaceful - she knows something is changed

49.speaker: Mask of Regret
49.text: But it's gone - I can think clearly. The hag - no. Ethel is finally dead, isn't she?
49.context: NodeContext: this is the first time she's said ethel's name aloud - big moment for her - she's not scared, not anymore

60.speaker: Mask of Regret
60.text: I wish Mayrina could see this - she'd be dancing with me on Ethel's grave.

51.speaker: Mask of Regret
51.text: My grandkids are going to be sick of hearing about the time I met the greatest hag-slayer of them all. Thank you.

58.speaker: Mask of Regret
58.text: Mate, I'm so bloody sorry for coming at you. I'd no idea the dragonborn was one of the hag's.
58.context: NodeContext: grim - she attacked the player

12.speaker: Mask of Regret
12.text: I should have known something was up with that sleazy shit. I should've stopped him!

68.speaker: Mask of Regret
68.text: Breathe, come on - get your head together.
68.context: NodeContext: speaking to herself, head is in pain, trying to calm down
